data.actual_result: The channel will scroll up subtlely (about the size of a message or two) and must be rescrolled down until the embed is outside the latest 50 messages.
data.expected_result: The channel doesn't scroll up and stays at the normal position.
data.short_description: Rich Embeds with thumbnails in the first 50 messages loaded cause subtle scrolling
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a bot that can post a rich embed. - Send rich embed content to the bot. (ensure it has a thumbnail included!) - Have a few users post a few messages. - Observe.
